New Records: Bhuvneshwar Kumar's second T20I five-wicket haul
Virat Kohli's 71st international hundred, equalling Ricky Ponting's tally of international hundreds
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's unbeaten 122 helped India post 212 for 2 in Dubai
Bhuvneshwar Kumar's 5-wicket haul restricted Afghanistan to 111
India secured a 101-run win over Afghanistan
Ibrahim Zadran's 64 gave some respectability to Afghanistan's total
Miscellaneous Highlights: India ended a forgetful Asia Cup 2022 campaign on a high
India's second-biggest win ever in a T20 international
